segments.text: I am a student in Cambridge University . I read your ad , I want to know something more about your room , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's a big bedroom with a drawing room , facing a beautiful wood .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , but there is one downstairs , which my daughter used some years ago .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It sounds good . Could I go and see it myself ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: ( after a while ) Good afternoon , Mrs . Smith . I called you just now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This way please . Your room is upstairs ... Here it is .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wonderful ! A modest , comfortable room . Ah , a beautiful window , through which I can see a beautiful scene , and hear the birds singing . How nice !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , if you want to wash something , there is a separate lavatory room outside .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Excellent ! I like it ! When can I move in ?
segments.speaker: S2
